mtte.configFlattenStructureHint: When this option is enabled and a folder contains only one scene, Moulinette will not display the folder but only the scene to avoid cluttering the tree structure.
mtte.configHideEmptyFoldersHint: When checked, Moulinette will not display folders that do not contain scenes
mtte.configLinkColorHint: Set the text color for links.
mtte.configSceneMergeRegexHint: This configuration allows merging scenes based on their name. It's a regular expression representing the pattern used at the end of the scene names. Please refer to the documentation for more details.
mtte.navigationToolsHelpContent:
The navigation lists all scenes from the selected folder.
  • Click to navigate to the scene.
  • SHIFT + click to activate the scene.
  • You can set a keybind to quickly toggle the navigation (Under Configure Controls).
See Documentation for more information.
mtte.obsidianExporterDescription: This utility allows you to export the current world to Obsidian format. Choose below which documents you want to export and the permissions to apply.
